name: QuickPick
description:
QuickPick - is a mental math game
Players need to quickly calculate the time stipulated otherwise would be regarded as false. To reach the level you need to earn enough 3 stars. Depending on which one star level corresponding to the correct time in a row. Example:
  Level 0 (10): 1 star = 10 times in a row correct
  Level 1 (9): 1 star = 9 times in a row correct.
  Level 2 (8): 1 star = 8 times in a row correct.
At each level the number will be more difficult calculations. 5 heart corresponding 5 plays, you need to earn hearts by consecutive correct answers and level up, share app to a friend.
QuickPick only 10 levels, you try to conquer it and see. That's hard, not easy anywhere.
Wish you success and conquer the levels of QuickPick level.
Thank you
